restaurant

Class HostAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • agent.Agent
      • restaurant.HostAgent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HostInterface

    public class HostAgent
extends Agent
implements HostInterface
    Host agent for restaurant. Keeps a list of all the waiters and tables. Assigns new customers to waiters for seating and keeps a list of waiting customers. Interacts with customers and waiters.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  HostAgent.MyWaiter
      Private class to hold waiter information and state
      private class  HostAgent.Table
      Private class storing all the information for each table, including table number and state.
